briefTitle: A Study of the Effectiveness and Safety of Mometasone Furoate Nasal Spray (MFNS, SCH 032088) for the Treatment of Nasal Polyps (P05604)
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Multicenter Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of 200 mcg BID Mometasone Furoate Nasal Spray (MFNS) in the Treatment of Nasal Polyps (Protocol No. P05604)
summary: This study will evaluate the effectiveness and safety of MFNS in improving nasal congestion/obstruction and in reducing bilateral nasal polyps.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Congestion/Obstruction Score
